New York, NY or US REMOTE | Cafe

We're looking for engineer #2 to join our team working on next-generation tools for content publishing. Our team is still under 10 people, so you'll have meaningful equity & influence, but we also have significant resources thanks to our CEO's last exit (sold to Amazon for $545M).

As the second developer on our team, you'll have significant latitude to make technical decisions autonomously. We hope you'll be comfortable taking features all the way from idea to production. As our DevOps lead, you'll have total autonomy to architect and implement our infrastructure.

More info here: http://www.cafe.com/developers Apply by emailing your GitHub/CV/etc. to morgante@cafe.com
